```{r load-packages, include = F}

packages <- c(
      'devtools', #for session info
      'ggthemes', #for plots
      'blogdown',
      'RColorBrewer',
      'colorspace',
      'tibble'
)
lapply(packages, function(x) {
  if (!requireNamespace(x)) install.packages(x)
  library(x, character.only = TRUE)
})
```

# [Sample Palettes](#palettes)

```{r sample-palettes}
cs <- tibble(x = 1:5,
             y = .5,
             color = colorspace::qualitative_hcl(5, palette = "dark2"),
             package = "colorspace"
             )
br <- tibble(x = 1:5,
             y = .5,
             color = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(5, name = "Set1"),
             package = "brewer"
)
rb <- tibble(x = 1:5,
             y = .5,
             color = rainbow(5),
             package = "rainbow"
)
hcl <- tibble(x = 1:5,
             y = .5,
             color = hcl.colors(5),
             package = "hcl_set_1"
)
vir <- tibble::tibble(x = 1:5,
              y = .5,
              color = hcl.colors(5, palette = "viridis"),
              package = "viridis"
)
mun <- tibble(
        x = 1:5,
        y = .5,
        color = 
)
library(dplyr)
dt <- dplyr::bind_rows(br, cs, rb, hcl, vir) |> 
        group_by(package) |> 
        arrange(color)
#munsell::value_slice(value_name = 1)
dt |> 
        ggplot() +
        aes(x, y, fill = color) +
        geom_tile() +
        geom_text(data = dt, label = dt$color, color = "white") +
        facet_grid(vars(package)) +
        theme_void() +
        theme(legend.position = "none") 
```

# [Sample Plots](#plots)

```{r sample-plots}
plot_iris <- function(color, title){
        iris |> 
        ggplot() +
        aes(Sepal.Length, Petal.Length, group = Species, color = Species) +
        geom_point() +
        geom_rangeframe() +
        scale_color_manual(values = color) +
        theme_tufte() +
        scale_x_continuous(name = "") +
        scale_y_continuous(name = "") +
        theme(legend.position = "none") +
        labs(title = title)
}
p1 <- plot_iris(color = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(3, "Dark2"),
                title = "RColor Brewer")
p2 <- plot_iris(color = hcl.colors(3, palette = "viridis"),
                title = "Viridis")
p3 <- plot_iris(color = colorspace::qualitative_hcl(3, palette = "dark2"),
                title = "Colorspace")
p4 <- plot_iris(color = rainbow(3),
                title = "Rainbow")
p5 <- plot_iris(color = hcl.colors(3),
                title = "hcl.colors(3)")
library(patchwork)
(p1 + p2 + p3) / (p4 + p5)
```
